description: This Chickpea Salad with Cucumber and Cabbage is crunchy, flavorful and filling!
keywords: Chickpea Salad with Cucumber and Cabbage
name: Chickpea Salad with Cucumber and Cabbage
recipeIngredient: 1 extra large cucumber, or two small cucumbers (I like to use English cucumbers)
2 (15 oz) cans chickpeas, drained and rinsed
1/3 cup chopped fresh herbs, I used cilantro and mint
1/2 cup roasted and salted sunflower seeds

recipeInstructions.text: Dice up the cucumber, cabbage and red onion. I like to dice them pretty finely so theyâ€™re similar sized to the chickpeas. Add the diced vegetables to a large bowl and then adding the chickpeas and fresh herbs.

Add all dressing ingredients to a medium sized bowl and whisk together. Pour dressing over the salad and mix until everything is combined. Add in the sunflower seeds and mix again. Serve immediately, or refrigerate for up to 4 days.
